Uses of Class
camzup.core.Ray3

Packages that use Ray3 
Package Description
camzup.core  
camzup.pfriendly  

  • Uses of Ray3 in camzup.core

    Methods in camzup.core that return Ray3 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Ray3 Curve3.eval​(Curve3 curve, float step, Ray3 ray)
    Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] , returning a ray.
    static Ray3 CurveEntity3.eval​(CurveEntity3 ce, int curveIndex, float step, Ray3 rayWorld, Ray3 rayLocal)
    Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] for a curve in the entity, returning a coordinate on the curve and a tangent.
    static Ray3 Curve3.evalFirst​(Curve3 curve, Ray3 ray)
    Evaluates the first knot in the curve.
    static Ray3 Curve3.evalLast​(Curve3 curve, Ray3 ray)
    Evaluates the first knot in the curve.
    static Ray3 Ray3.fromPoints​(Vec3 origin, Vec3 dest, Ray3 target)
    Sets a ray from an origin and destination point.
    Ray3 Ray3.lookAt​(Vec3 target)
    Sets this ray to look at a target point.
    static Ray3 Face3.orientation​(Face3 face, Ray3 target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a ray based on the face's normal.
    static Ray3 Vert3.orientation​(Vert3 vert, Ray3 target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a ray based on the vertex's normal and coordinate.
    Ray3 Ray3.reset()
    Resets this ray to a default.
    Ray3 Ray3.set​(Ray3 source)
    Sets this ray from a source.
    Ray3 Ray3.set​(Vec3 origin, Vec3 dir)
    Sets the origin and direction of this ray.

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] for a curve in the entity, returning a coordinate on the curve and a tangent.
    static Vec3 Ray3.eval​(Ray3 ray, float time, Vec3 target)
    Finds the point at a given time on a ray.
    static Ray3 Curve3.evalFirst​(Curve3 curve, Ray3 ray)
    Evaluates the first knot in the curve.
    static Ray3 Curve3.evalLast​(Curve3 curve, Ray3 ray)
    Evaluates the first knot in the curve.
    static Transform3 Transform3.fromDir​(Ray3 ray, Handedness handedness, Transform3 target)
    Creates a transform from a ray.
    static Ray3 Ray3.fromPoints​(Vec3 origin, Vec3 dest, Ray3 target)
    Sets a ray from an origin and destination point.
    static Ray3 Face3.orientation​(Face3 face, Ray3 target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a ray based on the face's normal.
    static Ray3 Vert3.orientation​(Vert3 vert, Ray3 target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a ray based on the vertex's normal and coordinate.
